entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and has a dog named Fang. He is running away from Umbridge's Stunning Spell.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is Hagrid's dog that he is wearing around his neck.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is a teacher at Hogwarts who casts a Stunning Spell on Hagrid.

entities.name: professor tofty
entities.description: Professor Tofty is a teacher at Hogwarts who announces the remaining time for the exam.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is taking the exam with him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who is taking the exam with him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is taking the exam.

relationships.description: Umbridge casts a Stunning Spell on Hagrid.
Hagrid is wearing Fang around his neck.
